channel.title: Only 1 player
channel.description:
hy guys, im working on a custom dungeoneering, its almost done but everyone can enter the room with all other people.
so i hope someone can tell me how to let only 1 player enter the minigame skill (solo dungeoneering ) so if he clicks on the dungeon entrance he will be in the room but he is the only one and other players go in the same room to but alone, everyone needs to do it solo xd

item.title: Only 1 player
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

RandQm:

You’ll gotta add it in your player updating so it doesn’t update th eplayers apart form yourself while being in that room.

This or create an Instanced Map (probably beyond Mopar’s understanding). RuneScape does this for things such as Cutscenes.

Read full topic
